name: Justin Gilbert
text: You can see from the last few reviews it's fallen a bit down hill. Last couple times it's been disorganized. Pre-order and you stand around for 5 minutes etc. The staff should train their people better.

name: Jon Herron
text: Most of time it's a 5/10 min wait but that way u know its fresh so the wait ain't nothing,  the pizza is always awesome

name: Hey Buttons
text: Decent pizza. Had better in Topeka but this isn't bad.

name: Jessica Ortega
text: It was horrible. I had a rude girl who waited on me took her 5 minutes to stop cleaning to help me with my order. She was already mad bc it was 15 min until close. My pizza wasnt made right and with the attitude I got from the girl names Machaela we will not be back!

name: Jessica Anders
text: I order weekly here for my family. When I walked in there were 2 teenagers working a young man took my order and dropped my change on the counter. 5 minutes later a young girl came out with no hair net or gloves. I asked 3 times for her to â€¦More

name: Randy Whistler
text: Not only is this site closed, but the building has been torn down!  CLOSED CLOSED CLOSED

name: Tracy Spaulding
text: My daughter and I walked in. We order a special pizza. The young man give us attitude. Then made the pizza wrong. Then was mad that it was wrong. The attitude just got worst from there. Will not be back.

name: korene clark
text: The store off 29th and Wanamaker is the worst for customer service.  Manager will not even listen to your request.

name: RapidRic
text: Slow, no help, not great pizza

name: Erika Spaulding
text: Gone there twice and it's been horrible. The first time the guy had an attitude. The second time my pizza was wrong.
